channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for VA
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for VA

item.title: Report X-2024040660
item.description:
Report X-2024040660

Identified by scraper @ 2024-04-16T18:13:46+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-04-03
  • City: SOUTH CHESTERFIELD
  • State: VA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was found on the trailer leaking and qa was immediately notified of the leakage. Package was then placed into a salvage drum to be inspected. DescribePack: Package was found leaking from the inside. Box was soaking in corrosive cleaner due to the loose caps. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Package was then placed into a salvage drum to be inspected.

item.title: Report X-2024040710
item.description:
Report X-2024040710

Identified by scraper @ 2024-04-15T15:12:24+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-04-04
  • City: ROANOKE
  • State: VA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Rail
  • Carrier/Reporter: NORFOLK SOUTHERN CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 4500
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: Mechanical employee conducting an outbound inspection noticed the strong smell of sulfur in the area of SHPX 209817. He left the area and reported it. NS Haz Mat and contractor responded checked the car and found high S02 reading around the manway area. We could also hear a hissing from the manway. Tightening manway bolts did not stop leak. Manway was opened and found to have two (2) gaskets in place, one flat in the manway cover and one mounted on the manway nozzle. Both gaskets were removed and replaced with new one. Manway was secured and tested with meter. No detect. Car was release for transportation.

  • Description: SequenceEvent: HAZMAT WAS FOUND BY A PACKAGE HANDLER UNLOADING A TRUCK. HAZMAT WAS GIVEN TO OPS MANAGER AND PLACED IN THE HAZMAT CAGE UNDER THE HOOD. THE HOOD WAS TURNED ON. DescribePack: THE PACKAGE WAS CRACKED DUE TO THE PACKAGING OF THE MATERIAL. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: HAZMAT WAS PLACED UNDER THE HOOD

item.title: Report E-2024040216
item.description:
Report E-2024040216

Identified by scraper @ 2024-04-11T15:11:27+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-03-14
  • City: ROANOKE
  • State: VA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: A. DUIE PYLE INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: While unloading freight from trailer material handler discovered an IBC that was leaking from the top. A pallet that was loaded on K-Bars above had fallen over and as a result a nail from the pallet that fell punctured the top of the IBC. The spilled material was neutralized and cleaned with absorbent and the IBC was repaired and sent to ultimate consignee without further incident.

item.title: Report I-2024040034
item.description:
Report I-2024040034

Identified by scraper @ 2024-04-11T15:11:27+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-03-07
  • City: Cloverdale
  • State: VA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: SOUTHEASTERN FREIGHT LINES, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: During the loading phase of trailer, dock associate slid the drum across the rear of trailer and the bottom of drum was cut by the metal trailer plate. Drum was then placed in a position to where the material would not leak further. All spillage of material was confined to immediate area for cleanup.
